scripts.install: cd srv && npm install && cd ../cmp && npm install
scripts.boil: echo 'boiling...' && npm run boil-srv && npm run boil-cmp
scripts.boil-srv: node -e 'srv = require(`./srv/package.json`);require(`assert`)(!srv.name && !srv.version, `srv package.json should not have name or version fields`)'
scripts.boil-cmp: node -e 'cmp = require(`./cmp/package.json`);require(`assert`)(!cmp.name && !cmp.version, `cmp package.json should not have name or version fields`)'
